full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/26/2023 4. Did the applicant's disability or impairment result from the illegal use of drugs? If the applicant is developmentally disabled, did this condition first manifest itself before age 22? Please explain. The aplicant's disability and impairment did not result from the illegal use of drugs. 5. What is the duration of the applicant's disability or impairment? Is it temporary (less than 12 months) or permanent? Explain. Sthe patient's medical conditions are permanent. The treatment for mitral reaurgitation is only palliative. She cannot ssubjectito ersible mental and physical stress. Herlability to memorize new information is limited and her cognitive capacity impaired her form learning. 6. Please provide your medical speciality. If you are not specialized, provide your medical experience and other qualifications that permit you to make this assessment. Internal Medicine, Cardiology. I certify under penalty of perjury under the laws of the United States of America, that the information on the form and any evidence submitted with it is all true and correct.
